about_the_game:
This DLC adds the following voice packs which were created as rewards for backers of the Yatagarasu Attack on Cataclysm IndieGogo campaign:

Custom Voice Pack - Actors
Customize the 'new challenger'; announcement by selecting an Attendant from the menu in the screenshot below.

Custom Voice Pack - Announcers
Select your Country, Affiliation, and Name, and they will be announced at the character select screen. (The announcement occurrence is randomized, and will not happen every time.)

{STEAM_APP_IMAGE}/extras/attendant.jpg
detailed_description:
This DLC adds the following voice packs which were created as rewards for backers of the Yatagarasu Attack on Cataclysm IndieGogo campaign:

Custom Voice Pack - Actors
Customize the 'new challenger'; announcement by selecting an Attendant from the menu in the screenshot below.

Custom Voice Pack - Announcers
Select your Country, Affiliation, and Name, and they will be announced at the character select screen. (The announcement occurrence is randomized, and will not happen every time.)

{STEAM_APP_IMAGE}/extras/attendant.jpg
name: Yatagarasu Attack on Cataclysm Custom Voice Packs

package_groups.name: default

subs.option_text: Yatagarasu Attack on Cataclysm - Custom Voice Packs - $29.99 USD

package_groups.title: Buy Yatagarasu Attack on Cataclysm Custom Voice Packs

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7
  • Processor: Pentium 4 3.0GHz or better
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Must support 640x480 resolution. Certain laptops and onboard video cards may have compatibility issues.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: Windows 8 is not yet officially supported, but Yatagarasu Attack on Cataclysm has been tested without problems on Win 8 laptops and desktops.

short_description: This DLC adds two voice packs which were created as rewards for backers of the Yatagarasu Attack on Cataclysm IndieGogo campaign.
